00025 
00026     class Range : public Frame {
00027 
00028      public:
00029 
00030         Range( int from = 0, int to = 0 ) : Frame( _Range_.getFrame() ), _from( from ), _to( to ) { }
00031         Range( Frame* proto ) : Frame( proto ), _from( 0 ), _to( 0 ) { }
00032 
00033         string inspect() { char buffer[256]; sprintf(buffer, "%d..%d", _from, _to); return buffer; }
00034         string toString() { char buffer[256]; sprintf(buffer, "%d..%d", _from, _to); return buffer; }
00035 
00036         unsigned int from() { return _from; }
00037         unsigned int to() { return _to; }
00038 
00039         unsigned int size() { return _to - _from + 1; }
00040 
00041         unsigned int sum()
00042         {
00043             int sum = 0;
00044             
00045             for (int i = _from; i <= _to; i++)
00046             {
00047                 sum += i;
00048             }
00049 
00050             return sum;
00051         }
00052 
00053         unsigned int product()
00054         {
00055             int product = 1;
00056 
00057             for (int i = _from; i <= _to; i++)
00058             {
00059                 product *= i;
00060             }
00061 
00062             return product;
00063         }
00064 
00065      private:
00066 
00067         int _from, _to;
00068 
00069     };
00070 
00071  //
00072  // class RangeProto
00073  //
00074 
00075     class RangeProto : public Range {
00076 
00077      public:
00078 
00079         RangeProto() : Range( _Object_.getFrame() ) { }
00080 
00081         string inspect() { return "[RangeProto]"; }
00082      
00083         void initSlots()
00084         {
00085             setSlot( Symbol::at( "size" ), new Method<RangeProto>( &RangeProto::_size ) );
00086             setSlot( Symbol::at( "sum" ), new Method<RangeProto>( &RangeProto::_sum ) );
00087             setSlot( Symbol::at( "product" ), new Method<RangeProto>( &RangeProto::_product ) );
00088             setSlot( Symbol::at( "each:" ), new Method<RangeProto>( &RangeProto::_each_ ) );
00089             setSlot( Symbol::at( "map:" ), new Method<RangeProto>( &RangeProto::_map_ ) );
00090         }
00091 
00092      protected:
00093      
00094         Value _size( Array& args, Value self )      { return self.get<Range>()->size(); }
00095         Value _sum( Array& args, Value self )       { return self.get<Range>()->sum(); }
00096         Value _product( Array& args, Value self )   { return self.get<Range>()->product(); }
00097         Value _each_( Array& args, Value self )
00098         {
00099             Range& range = *self.get<Range>();
00100             Block& block = *args.at( 0 ).get<Block>();
00101 
00102             Array blockArgs( 1 );
00103             
00104             for (unsigned int i = range.from(); i <= range.to(); i++)
00105             {
00106                 blockArgs.atPut( 0, i );
00107                 block.call( blockArgs, &block ).getFloat();
00108             }
00109             
00110             return _nil_;
00111         }
00112 
00113         Value _map_( Array& args, Value self )
00114         {
00115             Range& range = *self.get<Range>();
00116             Block& block = *args.at( 0 ).get<Block>();
00117 
00118             Array* values = new Array();
00119             Array blockArgs( 1 );
00120             
00121             for (unsigned int i = range.from(); i <= range.to(); i++)
00122             {
00123                 blockArgs.atPut( 0, i );
00124                 values->push( block.call( blockArgs, &block ) );
00125             }
00126             
00127             return values;
00128         }
00129     };
00130 
00131 }
